channel.title: Go Humble! RSS GAMES
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle games bundles!

item.title: Summer Games Done Quick 2025
item.content:encoded: Help support the annual Summer Games Done Quick live-stream event with our latest collaborative bundle with GamesDoneQuick! Add a collection of fun, fast-paced games tied to the speedrunning community to your library—and feel good doing it. Plus, a portion of your purchase goes directly to Doctors Without Borders. Try your hand at speedrunning with competitive and entertaining titles like Finding Frankie, Code Bunny, Catlateral Damage: Remeowstered, and more. Don’t miss the charity stream extravaganza—tune in to Games Done Quick from July 6–12, 2025!

item.title: Summer Splash
item.description: From the beach to your gaming setup
item.content:encoded: Dive into great water-themed games with the all-new Summer Splash Bundle. Defend the heir to the crabby kingdom using expert strategy and coral reefs as defense in Crab God. Leap through a kid-friendly action-platformer set on the island of Mara in Koa and the 5 Pirates of Mara. Explore the dark depths of the ocean with an unparalleled sense of atmosphere in ABZU, and more. Play great games that emphasize ocean conservation—and help support Coral Guardian with your purchase.

item.title: Upload VR Summer 2025
item.description: Dive into a new reality with VR
item.content:encoded: Pay what you want to start your VR gaming journey with our latest bundle of immersive titles! Step into the boots of a master swordsman and experience intense, physics-based combat in Until You Fall. Then dive into the mind-bending world of Vertigo 2 as you uncover the mysteries of a quantum reactor teeming with aliens, rogue robots, and deadly fauna. Play these standout VR games and more—plus, a portion of your purchase helps support the mental health advocates at Safe In Our World.

item.title: 2K Classic Trilogies: Mafia X Bioshock
item.description: Feel the rapture of crime and control
item.content:encoded:
Nostalgic for cinematic masterpiece games? Then you need the 2K Classic Trilogies: Mafia X Bioshock Bundle! Go from cabdriver to mob boss in the complete Mafia I–III, and uncover the truth behind genetic weaponry with the definitive Bioshock trilogy. Pay what you want for the ultimate Mafia and Bioshock collection and experience true 2000s gaming bliss. Run the city or save the city—plus, your purchase helps support the charity Covenant House!

Note: One key for Bioshock: The Collection and one key for Mafia Trilogy.

item.title: Serenity Forge Storyteller's Bundle
item.description: Indie games that make an impact
item.content:encoded: Great games come in all shapes and sizes—pay what you want and explore the inventive library of indie developer and publisher Serenity Forge with our latest bundle! The pros at Serenity Forge are master storytellers, supporting exceptional titles that move your soul like Arcadian Atlas, Long Gone Days, Virgo Versus the Zodiac, and more. Play meaningful and impactful games that challenge the way you think, and help support Children's Miracle Network Hospital of Colorado today!

item.title: June Tunes
item.content:encoded: Fans of music and games—say hi to the June Tunes Bundle! This collection perfectly blends everything you love about music and gaming to deliver fun and unique gameplay experiences. Remix tracks from popular artists like Marshmello, Porter Robinson, and Yukika in DJ Max Respect V, keep the rhythm with a single button in One Btn Bosses, and follow the beat to defeat enemies in Rhythm Fighter. Play great rhythm games and help support Girls Who Code with your purchase!
